com.net2plan.utils

Class RandomUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.net2plan.utils.RandomUtils

  • public class RandomUtils
extends Object

    Provides static methods to obtain both random numbers and vectors.

    Author:
    Pablo Pavon-Marino, Jose-Luis Izquierdo-Zaragoza

    • Method Summary
